abstract: Labor union representing 280,000 current and retired letter carriers is enlisting former investment banker Ron Bloom and financial firm Lazard to help forge strategy to revitalize the United States Postal Service.
snippet: The letter carriers are enlisting Ron Bloom, a former investment banker, and Lazard, the big financial firm, to help forge a strategy to revitalize the postal service.
